True false That\'s correct That\'s incorrect The study of plants is known as botany. //True Kelvin is a measure of temperature. //True The human skeleton is made up of less than 100 bones. //False - 206 The human body has four lungs. //False - 2 Albert Einstein was awarded the Nobel Prize in Physics. // True Spiders have six legs. //False - 8 Water is an example of a chemical element. //False Sharks are mammals. //False Shark are Fish Electrons are larger than molecules. //False Venus is the closest planet to the Sun. //False - Mercury The Atlantic Ocean is the biggest ocean on Earth. //False - Pacific Ocean previous next_text
